conversations.body_text: Hi Ruben Nørgaard,      We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from vacation. Your package has already been shipped, and we are unable to cancel it for you. We're sorry.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3263331785517

How should i go about the return, should i just not pick up the parcel?

On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 9:05 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Ruben Nørgaard,    Failure to accept delivery will void your eligibility for a refund. You may return the package directly upon receipt, but according to our return policy: If the product is in perfect condition, you will be responsible for the return shipping costs.

But I wrote you really fast for a cancellation of the order, and because
you were on vacation I now have to pay for the shipping? That doesn't seem
fair.

tors. 27. nov. 2025 11.56 skrev service@simsonn.com

How can i return it to you?


On Thu, Nov 27, 2025 at 12:37 PM Ruben Nørgaard <norgaardruben@gmail.com>
wrote:

> But I wrote you really fast for a cancellation of the order, and because
> you were on vacation I now have to pay for the shipping? That doesn't seem
> fair.
>
> tors. 27. nov. 2025 11.56 skrev service@simsonn.com

I would like to return my order can you please inform me on how to do that?

On Thu, Nov 27, 2025 at 3:56 PM Ruben Nørgaard <norgaardruben@gmail.com>
wrote:

> How can i return it to you?
>
>
> On Thu, Nov 27, 2025 at 12:37 PM Ruben Nørgaard <norgaardruben@gmail.com>
> wrote:
>
>> But I wrote you really fast for a cancellation of the order, and because
>> you were on vacation I now have to pay for the shipping? That doesn't seem
>> fair.
>>
>> tors. 27. nov. 2025 11.56 skrev service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com
>> >:
>>
>>> Hi Ruben Nørgaard,
>>>
>>> Failure to accept delivery will void your eligibility for a refund. You
>>> may return the package directly upon receipt, but according to our return
>>> policy: If the product is in perfect condition, you will be responsible for
>>> the return shipping costs.
>>>
>>> On Thu, 27 Nov at 4:29 AM , Ruben Nørgaard <norgaardruben@gmail.com>
>>> wrote:
>>> How should i go about the return, should i just not pick up the parcel?
>>>
>>> On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 9:05 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Ruben Nørgaard,    You can return the item to our warehouse in Germany:  Gubitz GmbH(LeiXuan A211)  Hüttenkamp 12  Neumünster,Schleswig-Holstein   24536  +49 17622233089

It says that you will send me shipping label?

ons. 3. dec. 2025 11.45 skrev service@simsonn.com

[image: image.png]The parcel has been shipped to your warehouse in Germany
for a refund as requested

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 7:09 PM Ruben Nørgaard <norgaardruben@gmail.com>
wrote:

> It says that you will send me shipping label?
>
> ons. 3. dec. 2025 11.45 skrev service@simsonn.com
Hi Ruben Nørgaard,    Alright, we'll process your refund after inspecting the returned item.

Have you received the parcel, and if so where are you in the process?

tirs. 9. dec. 2025 12.10 skrev service@simsonn.com
Hi Ruben Nørgaard,    We are contacting the warehouse for confirmation.

And so did you get any information?

man. 22. dec. 2025 12.31 skrev service@simsonn.com
